page.title: 16Folk Customs
page.content: Folk Customs Moretonhampstead has a Dancing Tree which every May people used to dance round in celebration of the coming harvest.Every August Moretonhampstead has a Carnival, this year is the 60th year of the carnival.The Carnival Queen is Jane Shears for 1985 her attendants will be Belinda Browning and Joanna Piggott.The fairy queen will be Melanie Slocombe,her attendants will be Georgina Rand and Karen Brimblecombe.Every year the school has a Mayday when there is lots of dancing and singing.
